title: Fluid for PC-SAFT EOS in CoolProp

___dipm_units.description: Units of the dipole moment provided

___u_units.description: Units of the dispersion energy provided

___sigma_units.description: Units of the segment diameter provided

___BibTeX.description: BibTeX reference to the source from which the PC-SAFT parameters were taken

___CAS.description: CAS registry number of the fluid

___molemass_units.description: Units of the molar mass provided

___volA_units.description: Units of the association volume provided

___u.description: Dispersion energy divided by Boltzmann constant (K)

___uAB_units.description: Units of the association energy provided

___dipnum.description: Number of dipole moments per molecule (-)
